title: Dialogos and Circling  weekend workshop - last call to register
description:
This weekend, Feb 19 and 20th, we will be running the second workshop on Dialogos and Circling.  Tonight and tomorrow are the last chance to register.

Dialogos & Circling weekend:
When: Feb 19-20 
Tuition: $250 
Time: 10AM - 4PM PST (both days)
Reserve Your Spot NOW!
To Register...
https://circlinginstitute.com/circling-dialogos/
We will send you the Zoom link after payment is received.
